mapper.insert: insert into freeboard(frboard_seq, member_id, frboard_title, frboard_content, frboard_img) values((select nvl(max(frboard_seq), 0)+1 from freeboard),#{member_id},#{frboard_title},#{frboard_content},#{frboard_img})
mapper.update: update freeboard set frboard_title=#{frboard_title}, frboard_content=#{frboard_content} where frboard_seq=#{frboard_seq}
mapper.select: select * from freeboard where frboard_title like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' order by frboard_seq desc
select * from freeboard where frboard_content like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' order by frboard_seq desc
